com.gwtext.client.widgets.menu
Class Menu

java.lang.Object
  com.google.gwt.user.client.ui.UIObject
      com.google.gwt.user.client.ui.Widget
          com.gwtext.client.widgets.BaseExtWidget

                  com.gwtext.client.widgets.menu.Menu
All Implemented Interfaces:
com.google.gwt.user.client.EventListener
Direct Known Subclasses:
ColorMenu, DateMenu
public class Menu
extends RequiredElementWidget

A menu object. This is the container to which you add all other menu items.
